channel.title: Wilson Chen | Writing
channel.description: Thoughts on engineering, products, and building software.

item.title: The Friction Between Intention and Execution
item.description: We've spent the last decade building better abstractions. React abstracted the DOM. Next.js abstracted routing and server-side rendering. Cloudflare abstracted infrastructure. Yet, somehow, it feels…

item.title: Building Static-First in an Era of Dynamism
item.description: There is a growing trend to render everything on the server dynamically. With the advent of Edge computing, we're told that dynamic rendering is basically free. But physics still applies. No matter…
